price: بيا مو را پاڅول ترڅو وګورو د هغو له دوو ډلونه كومه يوه د خپلې استوګنې موده ښه شميرلاى شي.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnāhum linaʿlama ayyu al-ḥiz'bayni aḥṣā limā labithū amadan
